name: Escort Mission 2020
description:
Escort Mission 2020 is a comedy stealth game where your goal is to escort a flock of sheep to greener pastures on the right of the screen. You don't control the sheep, but rather four sheep-dogs who have to keep the sheep in line, and protect them from treacherous wolves prowling the area. You control all four dogs at once, using all the keys on the keyboard.

Objective:

1) Coax all the sheep to go off the right side of the screen

2) Prevent wolves from eating the sheep

Controls:

Dog1: QWEASDZXC

Dog2: RTYDFGVBN

Dog3: UIOJKLM

Dog4:   

Debug: 

Levels 1-5: F1-F5

Main Menu: F6

Credits:

Programming: David-Andrew Samson

Music, Art, Sound Effects: Matthew Arling Samson

Special Thanks: Rachel Arling Samson
